data.name: Warlords: Age of Shadow Magic Tactical Action RPG
data.detailed_description:
How long can worlds be saved?
It's time to start conquering them and putting them in order!

Warlords: Age of Shadow Magic is a new collectible role-playing game (RPG)!

Instead of saving the world - conquer it!
Summon heroes, lead a squad and make your rules!
Become the best commander in tactical turn-based battles!

Summon different heroes, level up them and equip them with the best artifacts to be successful in the Campaign and Battles on the Arena.

The continent is torn apart by war between Humans, Dwarves, Elves and Orcs.
Conquer all kingdoms and begin your domination!

Be ready for new challenges, other players - your direct opponents for taking the Crown, will challenge your rule.

Peoples are whispering about invasion of the Undead hordes into the kingdom and about the animal-like humanoids near the border of the
Eternal Forest.

Warlords game features:

ROLE PLAYING GAME (RPG)

* Summon different heroes
* Upgrade their levels and skills
* Choose the best artifacts and upgrade them
* Conquer a continent in a Story Campaign

TACTICAL BATTLES

* Combine skills of heroes in synergy
* Place heroes in combat tactic positions
* Think over tactical steps

ONLINE PVP ARENA

* Online Battles with other players
* Make your team for the Arena fights
* Participate in the Tournament and get valuable prizes

DIFFERENT GAME MODES

* Campaign Story Mode
* Online battles on Arena
* Automatic battle
* Collecting Tribute

STYLIZED 3D GRAPHICS

* Different races
* Wide range of battle areas
* Vivid effects

data.short_description: Warlords: Age of Shadow Magic Tactical Action RPG Save the World by destroying it? Gather your squad and "put things in order"!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese, Turkish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® D или AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2600XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2,2 ГГц) AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 (2,6 ГГц)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 240 GT ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X® 10.12
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600M GT ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS® 10.13
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 650M ATI™ Radeon™ HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS, Fedora, Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600M GT ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS, Fedora, Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 650M ATI™ Radeon™ HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
